tool_description: Getting a daily information of knowledge for specific project. This information change every 24 hour
name: Daily Knowledge
title: Daily Knowledge

api_list.name: /sustainable-development-goals-en.json
api_list.description: The UN global goals for sustainable development.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-knowledge.p.rapidapi.com/sustainable-development-goals-en.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-knowledge.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
